h2_title: Venom Daoist Boss Fight and Guide - First Encounter
content: When up close, he'll usually either perform an overhand slash followed by a leaping attack, or he'll pull back his swords to your left for two quick slashes followed by a dash attack.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Venom_Daoist.md', within the main section titled 'Venom Daoist', specifically from the subsection 'Venom Daoist Boss Fight and Guide - First Encounter'.
The content is as follows:
When up close, he'll usually either perform an overhand slash followed by a leaping attack, or he'll pull back his swords to your left for two quick slashes followed by a dash attack.
